publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2386 Alasdair Allan: Association of Harris Tweed Weaversâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Harris Tweed weavers in the Western Isles on forming the Association of Harris Tweed Weavers; welcomes the formation of a body that can represent not only the interests of weavers but work to promote the industry as a whole, and looks forward to cross-industry co-operation in partnership with the Scottish Government and other agencies to ensure the bright future which Harris Tweed deserves. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor*, John Wilson*, Mike Pringle*, Dave Thompson*, Bashir Ahmad*, Sandra White*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*, Michael Matheson*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Gil Paterson*, Jim Tolson*
S3M-2386Association of Harris Tweed Weavers (lodged on 11 August 2008) Aileen Campbell*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2386 Association of Harris Tweed Weavers (lodged on 11 August 2008) Keith Brown*
